attr.title: Derelict
attr.desc: The Derelict is a scifi platformer developed by Programmancer for the GBJam5. Navigate the abandoned derelict spacecraft to restore power and stop the evil robot AI, the Master Circuit!
attr.inst: Download the game from https://programancer.itch.io/derelict and place the Derelict.zip in to the port's assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game from [Itch.io](https://programancer.itch.io/derelict) and place the `Derelict.zip` to the port's `assets` folder.
